name: Ever Angel: Wing of Angels
description:
Ever Angel: Wing of Angels is a classic Shoot em Up game. You are an angel, and have to protect the fairy world from swarms of invading monsters.Your mission is to beat them all! Fly to a mysterious forest, where cute monsters and epic bosses await you! .Ever Angel:Wing of Angels is a fantastic adventure into the fantasy world of monster and fairy . Touch screen to move,defeat all monsters in your adventure!

Features:
- Easy to play, hard to master
- Includes Power-ups and Bosses!
- Super smooth action on phone or tablet
- Awesome HD graphics
- Retro arcade feel
- Super fun and relax

The future of fairy world now in your hands. Download Ever Angel:Wing of Angels today!
